attributes.action: Primary Curriculum 2014 - no thanks to the draft proposals
attributes.additional_details:
#stop the teaching of subjects to specific  to each year group as in mixed year group classes this will be nearly impossible to deliver in History, Geography and Science
#make the History curriculum more relevant to the pupils' recent family history when in Key Stage One.
#get rid of Computing as a subject as the content of this draft proposal is much worse than the ICT we have now
#put PSHE back into the curriculum for Key Stage One and Two
#listen to the teachers in the classroom and not the so - called 'experts' and political point - scorers on the outskirts of day- to- day teaching. Teachers do not want change that reminds us of the 1950's. Ask them what works and what doesn't and then improve the curriculum we already have.
